article_title: NFL commissioner Goodell wants teams in Los Angeles and London — Sports — Bangor Daily News — BDN Maine

article_metadata.description: National Football League commissioner Roger Goodell wants to see league teams established in both Los Angeles and London, as long as the process was conducted in “the right way,” he said on Saturday.
